attributes.9: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Ser Wendel Manderly is the second son of Lord Wyman Manderly, the Lord of White Harbor and Warden of the White Knife. He is not quite as fat as his father and older brother, but is still considered immense. He is loud and boisterous, wears a large mustache and is bald.Wendel was killed in the book somewhat differently to the show: when the massacre started, he rose to his feet, an arrow went in his open mouth and came out the back of his neck, killing him instantly.==See also==* AWOIAF (MAJOR spoilers from the books)==References==ReflistDEFAULTSORT:Manderly, Wendelde:Wendel ManderlyCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 3 CharactersCategory:Status: DeadCategory:House Manderly

'''Wendel Manderly''' is a character who appears in the [[Season 3|third season]] episode "[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]". He is played by [[Oddie Braddell]]. Ser Wendel Manderly is a [[Knighthood|knight]] and a member of [[House Manderly]] of [[White Harbor]], loyal vassals of [[House Stark]].
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Wendel Manderly is the second son of Lord Wyman Manderly, the Lord of White Harbor and Warden of the [[White Knife]]. He is not quite as fat as his father and older brother, but is still considered immense. He is loud and boisterous, wears a large mustache and is bald.

Wendel was killed in the book somewhat differently to the show: when the massacre started, he rose to his feet, an arrow went in his open mouth and came out the back of his neck, killing him instantly.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 3]]===
Ser Wendel is part of the retinue that accompanies [[King]] [[Robb Stark]] to [[the Twins]] for the wedding of [[Edmure Tully]] and [[Roslin Frey]]. During the wedding feast, Ser Wendel sits besides Ser [[Brynden Tully]] and [[Walder Rivers|Black Walder Frey]]. Following the [[bedding]] of the newlyweds, Wendel is [[Red Wedding|murdered]] along with his King and the rest of the Stark bannermen.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
